item.title: Creating an analyzer to detect infinite loops caused by ThreadAbortExceptions
item.description: In this post I describe a Roslyn Analyzer I created to detect code that can result in infinite loops if a ThreadAbortException is raised Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/creating-an-analyzer-to-detect-infinite-loops-caused-by-threadabortexception/

item.title: Disabling localized satellite assemblies during dotnet publish
item.description: In this post I show how to reduce the size of the publish output for .NET apps by preventing the publishing of localization resources when they're not needed Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/disabling-localized-satellite-assemblies-during-dotnet-publish/
